Interface MapAdapter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConquestMapAdapter, DominationMapAdapter
public interface MapAdapter
This interface defines the contract for loading and saving maps in different file formats. It is used to adapt the map loading and saving functionality for various map formats like "domination" and "conquest" during the PreloadPhase and PostloadPhase of the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    loadMap(String p_filename)
    Loads a map file into memory.
    boolean
    saveMap(Parsing p_parsing)
    Saves the currently loaded map to a file.

  • Method Details

    • loadMap

      boolean loadMap(String p_filename)
      Loads a map file into memory.
      Parameters:
      p_filename - The name of the file to load.`
      Returns:
      true if successfully loaded, false otherwise.

    • saveMap

      boolean saveMap(Parsing p_parsing)
      Saves the currently loaded map to a file.
      Parameters:
      p_parsing - The Parsing object that contains the filename as its first argument.
      Returns:
      true if saving is successful, false otherwise.
